mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.trace_id as traceId , t.module as module , t.title as title , t.method as method , t.url as url , t.request_ip as requestIp , t.exception as exception , t.execute_time as executeTime , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.create_by as createBy , t.create_time as createTime , t.remark as remark , t.headers as headers , t.request_body as requestBody , t.response_body as responseBody
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_opt_log
id,
trace_id,
module,
title,
method,
url,
headers,
request_body,
response_body,
request_ip,
exception,
execute_time,
tenant_id,
create_by,
create_time,
remark,
#{id},
#{traceId},
#{module},
#{title},
#{method},
#{url},
#{headers},
#{requestBody},
#{responseBody},
#{requestIp},
#{exception},
#{executeTime},
#{tenantId},
#{createBy},
#{createTime},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
update t_sys_opt_log
trace_id = #{traceId},
module = #{module},
title = #{title},
method = #{method},
url = #{url},
headers = #{headers},
request_body = #{requestBody},
response_body = #{responseBody},
request_ip = #{requestIp},
exception = #{exception},
execute_time = #{executeTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId}
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_sys_opt_log t where t.id=#{id}
